content: trying to compile the compiler with incr on and getting ...

error[E0460]: found possibly newer version of crate `std` which `rustc_ast` depends on

9 | use rustc_ast as ast;
  |     ^^^^^^^^^

  = note: perhaps that crate needs to be recompiled?

          crate `rustc_ast`: /home/santiago/src/oss/rust1/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-rustc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/librustc_ast-a592480f4319a960.rmeta

just in case I'm not using keep-stage or anything like that
